meanings.definition: The act of filling or sealing gaps or cracks with putty.
meanings.sent1: After the window installation, the puttying was done to keep out the cold air.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter did a neat job of puttying the cracks in the wall.
meanings.sent3: The puttying of the door was so thorough that not even a mouse could squeeze through.
meanings.sent4: Her meticulous puttying of the vase made it look as good as new.
meanings.sent5: The puttying of the boat's hull was essential to prevent leaks during the storm.

meanings.definition: The process of applying putty to a surface to smooth or repair it.
meanings.sent1: Before painting, the puttying of the wall was necessary to make it even.
meanings.sent2: The puttying of the wooden table made it look brand new.
meanings.sent3: His exaggerated puttying of the floor made it so smooth that he slipped and fell.
meanings.sent4: The artist's delicate puttying of the sculpture brought out its finest details.
meanings.sent5: The puttying of the cracks in the sidewalk made walking much safer.
